name: EstimatedGestationalAgeAtBirth
title: Estimated Gestational Age at Birth
description: This value set is no longer used since 2019AU. A DRC (LOINC code) will be used in eCQMs.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent estimated gestational age at birth.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Assessment. The intent of this data element is to identify estimated gestational age at birth.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with SNOMED CT codes that identify estimated gestational age at birth.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Length of gestation at birth (observable entity)

contains.display: Length of gestation at birth (observable entity)
